question: {name1} hid {n} dozen eggs in the yard for the Easter egg hunt. {name2} finds {x} eggs. {name3} finds {mult1} times as many as {name2}. {name4} finds {y} less than {name3}, and {name5} finds a fraction of {frac} as many as {name4}. How many eggs are still hidden in the yard?
answer: n * 12 - (x + mult1 * x + (mult1 * x - y) + frac * (mult1 * x - y))
private_constraints: is_int(n * 12 - (x + mult1 * x + (mult1 * x - y) + frac * (mult1 * x - y)))
n * 12 > x + mult1 * x + (mult1 * x - y) + frac * (mult1 * x - y)
